<letter id='bsl848'>
<recipient first='' last='' type='individual'/>
<p>
<a href='/results.php?city=sacramento' rel='city origin'>Sacramento</a> 	<a rel='day origin' value='28'>28th</a> March, <a href="/results.php?year=1854">1854</a><br/>  
Mr. J.W. Mandeville,
</p><p>
Sir
</p><p>
Enclosed I send a letter from Mrs. D.A Enyart. Please peruse it and at your earliest convenience I would respectfully request an interview. Mr. Enyart is desirous to have an answer and I am as equally desirous that an amicable understanding should be had between you.
</p><p>
Can you call at the Orleans, say this afternoon at 4 or 5 o'clock. respectfully
</p><p>
Yr. etc.<br/>  
<a href="/results.php?tla=bsl" rel="me">Benj. S. Lippincott</a>
</p>
</letter>
